name: Amy Cortez
text: I love this place! Truly looking forward to going back seeing a movie at the AMC and finishing with a delicious pizza!

name: Israel Peña
text: We have a blaze pizza in the bay area as well. It was a little crowded but what do you expect, all blaze pizza I've been to have a little wait time. Service was great and the places was clean.

name: Jayden Capilla
text: Now don’t get me wrong, I LOVE blaze pizza. But the slow service, lack of customer service, and outside seating made eating here less than ideal and I would not come back to this location. My boyfriend and I came over from universal studios …More

name: Sara Kerrigan
text: We've been to several Blaze pizzas, and this was my least favorite experience. We have always been very happy before. The line was really long, which they couldn't help. But we had a miscommunication at the beginning of the line, and by the …More

name: Y.J. Chen
text: Nice pizzas and salad, and the warm heater is good for the outside tables in the winter. But the environment outside isn't good due to the lack of manpower.

name: Pauline Laing
text: Quality pizzas are made quickly here. You can watch the whole process, and customise your pizza as you like. Staff were very friendly and helpful.

name: David Snow
text: $10 for a build your own pizza of good quality that’s made fast with no limit on how many toppings you can add (for the most part)? Yeah, I dig that. So I went in real fast, made myself a bbq chicken with pineapple and bacon and was happy …More

name: Jeremy Kearney
text: Delicious pizza. Love the thin crust, red sauce and cheese. Also the Spinach and mushrooms. Very fast and very friendly service. And reasonable priced

name: Alyssa Marie
text: This is a great vegan option for anyone needing to eat at Universal City Walk or Studios ( but you'll have to leave the park). The servers have always been really good about changing their gloves when they make our vegan pizza and always …More

name: Chef Robert Olivares
text: Build your own pizza is the way to go, friendly staff and quick service!!! Thanks

name: Rogelio Vargas
text: Can’t go wrong with “Build your own pizza”...especially with unlimited toppings

name: Lunarro Lacey
text: Yes they have gluten free options. However they have zero training in how to handle them or know if there is gluten in their food. I had to ask them to change their gloves on SEVERAL OCCASIONS on top of them just not knowing what they were …More

name: Brittanie Branch
text: I ordered a pizza online / through the app because that is the only option. One  of the employees call me to notify me that they were closed (although online it says they were open for 2 more hours) and would not make my pizza. I couldn't …More

name: Meghan Quinn
text: My boyfriend and I (both strict Vegetarians) went to Blaze Out and ordered the Veg Out Pizza. But somehow, despite not being busy at all and having a receipt that clearly stated what we ordered, we received a pizza completely different from …More

name: Rachel Forsyth
text: Delicious pizza at affordable price. You would definitely worth your time and money.

name: Alexis R
text: Be prepared to wait here. I’ll never return because of how slow the service was, and how terrible it was. My pizza sat at the counter for 10 minutes before it got cut. The customer in front of me received burnt dough knots FOUR times and …More

name: K&Z Travel
text: Great thin crust vegan cheese pizza! Added great toppings, really tasty!

name: hottyson hottyson
text:
Pizza was good.
HOWEVER, the bald chubby punk that was cleaning the tables tonight 6/21/18 looked right at my dirty table and the garbage that I had placed on the far corner …More

name: Dar Ramos
text: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! Fast and efficient. Frankie has amazing customer service and great manners

name: Kasey Farley
text: Had to stand in line for 45 minutes.  This place is run by teenagers with no drive or initiative. Running around like chickens with their heads cut off (and by running I mean moving so slow I wanted to cry). Clearly no manager was running this shift.

name: Marisa
text: Good pizza but small store and gets crowded.

name: Anil Bhetuwal
text: Great firewood pizza! All the staffs were super nice and the pizza was delicious!

name: Dimitris Dodoras
text: I love this place! The pizza tastes amazing, no additional charge for vegan cheese, unlimited toppings and it's all ready in less than 10 minutes! And they even ask if they should change their gloves! Top-notch!

name: Christopher Rhoads
text: We have a blaze near my location in San Diego,  but the service here is far from the same.  Be prepared to wait.  I'm a food service professional, inspector and trainer for the Navy and was blown away by how this operation is run.  I dont …More

name: rachael mendieta
text: Even with a brand new employee, first day on the job, they were able to provide fast and friendly service. In addition, my pizza was hot and sooo good, love those finishers. Build your own IS the way to go.

name: Karthik Sekar
text: Pretty decent taste from this place though i had a bad delivery experience on a busy weekend eve !

name: Xavier
text: soooooo slow, compared to other locations. be prepared to wait. and the line wasn’t even that long too

name: Gabe Shakour
text: Quick, fairly priced and good tasting thin crust pizza. The outdoor seating is a definite plus. The line can get very long though so be warned.

name: Bobby Zamora
text: Love it you can put any items you want on there and still get a pie for less than ten dollars

name: Parker Eckerson
text: Awesome pizza! The ingredients are very fresh and simple. This place is a must stop every time we are in Hollywood.

name: Richard E
text: Had late evening pizza takeaway here after a day at Universal Studios. They were surprisingly good and our favorite was the green stripe. The service was also pretty fast and the pizzas were ready in 5-10 minutes.

name: jon chua
text: the quality here is consistent with all the other blaze pizzas... pick your toppings, and you can pile as much of it as you please. this location is about $1-2 more expensive than other blaze locations, but that is to be expected for …More

name: Reddeppa Maddipatla
text: Rude staff with no respect to customer.. They don’t care whether you request for veg only, they use same gloves used for  meat even you after couple of requests and I see meat pieces in my veg pizza. And they don’t even care about …More

name: Patty O'Shei
text: Visiting from the Buffalo, NY area. I have a gluten allergy and it was so good to be able to have delicious GF pizza in a restaurant. The workers were incredible. No questions asked about if it was really an allergy or comments about how it …More

name: Patrick Wroth
text: Best pizza I've had in LA. Great pizza for the price. Quickly made in the brick oven!

name: Mohammad Al- Enezi
text: Very delicious, fast service, reasonable prices but staff needs to be more freindly in dealing with customers

name: Trisha Comeau
text: Delish!

name: A-v Vyas
text: Rude employees. Once my pizza was ready, he didn't even call out the name or number... Just left it out there on the counter. I had to go and ask him, & I think the manager or supervisor was standing right there.. Didn't seem to care at all.

name: Joshua Rigrod
text: Love to rate higher but only outdoor seating.

name: Rashmi pali
text: Both Pizzas I orderd were super salty :(

name: Bradley Vinish
text: Blaze Pizza at the Universal CityWalk is the place to grab a slice when it is busy on the City Walk.   I like their thin crust pizza,  but on occasion it can be a little drippy, so grab some napkins and lean forward when you take a bite.

name: Ayan Ahmad
text: Amazing service

name: iiblxssed
text: Awfull customer service

name: Curt Hood
text: Very fresh

name: abe rodriguez
text: decent good fast pizza, its about $10.00 a pizza and it taste better than anything inside universal studios.

name: Jeya Srikanth
text: Best pizza.

text: Service sucks

text: Horrible costumer service they treated me in a mean attitude and forgot to ask what my seasoning was before throwing it into the oven.
